name: twitterannotator
description: Twitter Annotator is an UI-Prototype for annotation tweets.

scripts.build: npm run validateCsss && npm run lintCss && npm run lintHtml &&  npm run lintJs && npm run jsdoc && npm run htmlMinify && npm run jsMinfy && npm run cssMinfy && npm run imagemin && npm run copy
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc -d jsdoc -a all -p README.md js/annotator.ui.js  js/annotator.io.js
scripts.jsMinfy: minify js/annotator.ui.js --output docs/js/annotator.ui.js  -c --no-comments & minify js/annotator.io.js --output docs/js/annotator.io.js  -c --no-comments & minify js/rainbow-tweet.js --output docs/js/rainbow-tweet.js -c --no-comments
